content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Aug 20 (APP):Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs & Gilgit-Baltistan and SAFRON, Engineer Amir Muqam on Wednesday expressed profound grief and sorrow over the death of mother of senior journalist and anchorperson Absar Alam. In a statement, the president of PML-N Khyber Pakhtunkhwa condoled with Absar Alam and his family and prayed to Almighty may grant the deceased a high position in heaven. The minister also prayed that the bereaved family may bear this irreparable loss with patience and fortitude.
